name: Projection (Mathilde Conte)
description:
Congratulations! You have been randomly selected to be a crash test for five experiences (levels) on the shadows! Use your shadow to interact with specific objects like buttons, levers, and boxes to progress to the next test room. But pay attention to the environment: your body and your shadow don't have the same properties and weaknesses...

Credits Game Designers

Mathilde CONTE

Jérémy BECICA

Victor DUREL

Corto GARNIER

Thibault WEGNER

Programmers

Sami AMARA

Thomas DALLARD

Jonathan SIX
